```{r PiplartineGraph}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
Drug_response_data = read.table("Data/Bioinformatics Data.txt", sep="\t", header=TRUE)
Drug_response <- Drug_response_data %>% filter(Row == "A" & Compound %in% c("Mock", "Piplartine"))
ggplot(data = "Bioinformatics Data", mapping = aes(x = Timepoint, y = Nuclei_IntNucGFP_Mean_Mean_per_Well, by = Compound, color = Compound)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = lm)
```
